description:
'word to separate the number layers and to change the view.
E.g. -as reported- are exactly the numbers as they come from the external source
-detailed- are the most granular splitting of the -as reported- numbers
-projection- show the changes and includes the estimates to make a forecast
'
'A term with the same name as a formula
code_id: because some values can be calculated and can nevertheless be overwritten'
